tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BoxingEvents (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(255),
  event_date DATE,
  event_time TIME,
  venue_id INT,
  capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE event (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    venue_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (venue_id) REFERENCES venue(venue_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BoxingEvent(
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    event_date DATE NOT NULL,
    venue_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (venue_id) REFERENCES Venue(venue_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Booking(
    booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    booking_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES BoxingEvent(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE events (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  venue_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (venue_id) REFERENCES venues(id)
);

CREATE TABLE bookings (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT NOT NULL,
  fighter_id INT NOT NULL,
  booking_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (fighter_id) REFERENCES fighters(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Venue (venue_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
venue_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
venue_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Event (event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
venue_id UUID NOT NULL,
event_date DATE NOT NULL,
start_time TIME NOT NULL,
end_time TIME NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Boxer (boxer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
boxer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
weight_class VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Match (match_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
event_id UUID NOT NULL,
boxer1_id UUID NOT NULL,
boxer2_id UUID NOT NULL,
winner_id UUID,
score VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Booking (booking_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
match_id UUID NOT NULL,
spectator_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
booking_date DATE NOT NULL
)
